panels.description: This panel shows the total percent of 40x and 50x error requests per service.

panels.description: Average CPU usage percentage across all CPU cores on a node over the last 5 minutes. The result will be a value between 0% and 100%, where 0% indicates that all CPU cores were fully utilized, and 100% indicates that all CPU cores were idle
panels.title: cpu usage (node)
